name: Big Fish Tap - Eat Small Fish Classic Game
name_original: Big Fish Tap - Eat Small Fish Classic Game
description:
This is a classic puzzle skill game for kids.
The hungry small fish lives deep in the beautiful sea.Your mission is to help the little fish to grow up.
It's not easy to survive for small fish.There are many fierce fishes around you. You need to hunt little fishes to grow up and avoid been eaten by these bigger fishes!
Eat fish smaller than yourself to get growth,if you are too small and decide to eat a bigger fish, you will be the one to get eaten.
Go through many levels to become the biggest fish in the ocean!
Good luck.
